short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bolds the first half of any word in the source HTML of the webpage you are currently viewing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I saw some stuff about how Binary Reading (in which the first part of a word is bolded) can help folks read faster. Wanted to try making an extension. Just click on the button in the extension drop down to apply the formatting to the page you're on! (This is was a very quick project, just want to see if people would use it!)
